00053 struct TargetReaderData {
00054   std::vector<TagHandle> handles2D, handles3D; //< tag handles, indexed by #tags/elem
00055   std::vector< MsqMatrix<3,3> > targets3D; //< cached values for last element
00056   std::vector< MsqMatrix<2,2> > targets2D; //< cached values for last element
00057   std::vector< MsqMatrix<3,2> > targetsSurface; //< cached values for last element
00058   size_t elementIndex;                      //< element for which values are cached.
00059 };
00060
